scenarios.name: PFE_to_P2AB
scenarios.description: Traffic from PFE replicated to P2A and P2B for redundancy
scenarios.expected_behavior: Frames from PFE_MAC0 duplicated to both P2A and P2B

scenarios.name: P2A_to_PFE
scenarios.description: External traffic from P2A replicated through T1 ports, eliminated at PFE
scenarios.expected_behavior: Frames from P2A sent through P6/P7, duplicates removed at PFE

scenarios.name: T1_Ring
scenarios.expected_behavior: T1 traffic replicated through ring, eliminated at P10

scenarios.name: Critical_Control
scenarios.description: Triple redundancy for safety-critical control messages
scenarios.expected_behavior: Critical messages triplicated, PFE receives single copy
